name: Adakyte
description:
Adakyte is our first mini game project, 

And we wanted to keep everything short and simple, but also fun to play. We are aware that there are many areas to polish, but for a mini game, we hope that you enjoyed playing it!

Do follow our newly started Instagram accounts where we will be updating on future game productions/ projects.
